alert.note: Alert for Southern Cook, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 06 at 1:40PM CST until February 07 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Moderate snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Southern Cook County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Grand Portage Reservation. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 3 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates around 1 inch per hour are expected in the late evening hours and tapering after midnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
